## Before November 24th

- [ ] [Create an account on GitHub](https://docs.github.com/en/get-started/start-your-journey/creating-an-account-on-github){.external target="_blank"}, if you still don't have one
- [ ] Copy [this repository template](https://github.com/INN-SFU/BRS-repository_template){.external target="_blank"} and chage its name to reflect the theme of your group's project
- [ ] Make sure you have a Compute Canada account and can login to Fir
- [ ] [Set up your personal access token on Fir](pat_fir.qmd){.external target="_blank"}
- [ ] Make sure you have git correctly configured on your computer ([git documentation here](https://git-scm.com/book/en/v2/Getting-Started-First-Time-Git-Setup){.external target="_blank"})
- [ ] Fill out this pre-workshop survey by **November 21st**: [https://tally.so/r/A776Ro](https://tally.so/r/A776Ro){.external target="_blank"}
